name: Luminous Crucible
description:
you're a cloud. your reflection is trapped inside cursed mirrors. keep it safe from evil reflections by moving mirrors around and destroying any that get too dangerous.

how to play

wasd/arrow keys - move your cloud

  • if you try to move your reflection outside of the mirrors, you will get bounced back
  • otherwise you are free to move anywhere inside the mirrors

left click - drag mirrors around

right click - destroy a mirror and any enemies inside it

  • note that you can't destroy a mirror if it's the only one with your reflection in it
